"No Discrimination": This rule would prohibit any form of discrimination based on race, gender, religion, sexual orientation, or any other characteristic. It would create a more inclusive society where everyone feels valued and respected.

"No Pollution": This rule would require individuals and businesses to reduce their carbon footprint and minimize pollution. It would promote sustainability and protect the environment for future generations.

"No Bullying": This rule would ban all forms of bullying, including verbal, physical, and cyberbullying. It would create a safer and more welcoming environment for everyone, regardless of their background or status.
"No Poverty": This rule would ensure that everyone has access to basic necessities such as food, shelter, and healthcare. It would eliminate poverty and inequality, creating a more equitable society.

"No War": This rule would prohibit all wars and conflicts, promoting peace and diplomacy instead. It would prevent unnecessary suffering and loss of life, creating a more peaceful and harmonious world.
